Author: itsatreee
Content:
The big pitfall with "visuals" is the need to perform the "PPEffects" on the client side. The Modifiers handle when a player modifier is activated. (Think ActivateCondition from actions). Flags the modifier but now you actually have to do the visual effects. 

Symptoms are useful here because they have distinct server and client side method calls.

Author: itsatreee
Content: Player eats drug -> flags modifier -> inserts symptom into player -> experience visual effects

Author: itsatreee
Content: Drug effect wears off -> modifier is flagged off -> symptom is removed from player -> visuals stop
